title: ATLAS - CHECK THAT CLIENTS & ACCOUNTS ARCHIVING IS DEACTIVATED

task_list.instruction_title:
Desactivates jobs below :

CONTROL-M : EVX
APPLICATION : EX_ATLAS
SOUS-APPLICATION : EX_CORE_BANKING

JOB : P_SITUAM_1
JOB : P_SITUAM_1_1
JOB : P_SITUAM_1_2
JOB : P_SITUAM_1_3
JOB : P_SITUAM_2

**PROD Deactivation only applicable for Go-LIve migartion:**

CONTROL-M : PROD
APPLICATION : ATLAS
SOUS-APPLICATION : N_CORE_BANKING
